comment.body: You can find a way. There is always a way forward. And being intelligent is about being determined, it is will power to grow mentally. Take heart and if you feel that you still lack what you need to move forward,  then pray to God for help. Knock and the door will be presented and opened for you. God bless you and always keep going, aim even if only slightly upwards. In the end, you will be amazed at how far you've come.
